sectionWelcome.text: Let's play a game, shall we?
Do you know how to play Simon Says?
Then I will teach you! It’s not that hard.
list: Four squares will soon appear, you won’t miss them
I’ll start by clicking on one of them, it will light up and a sound will be heard (use headphones)
Then it’s your turn. And your job is to push the same button as I did.

sectionWelcome.text: But it will get harder. Much harder...
list: After that I will go again, but this time click two buttons
You’ll go after me and copy what I did
If you did it correct I’ll go again and add another button
And we will continue like this until you fail to follow my lead!
